```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
require(coronavirus)
require(tidyverse)
require(knitr)
require(kableExtra)

data("coronavirus")

coronavirus %>%
  group_by(Country.Region) %>%
  tally(sort=TRUE) %>%
  head(3) %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"))
```
